Mana.name: Mana
Mana.desc: Base limit of 3. When reaching the limit, spend the required <c=status>KNOWLEDGE</c> to gain 1 <c=status>POWERDRIVE</c> and 1 <c=status>LESSON</c>. Excess <c=status>KNOWLEDGE</c> is not lost.

BasicStatus.name: Basic Status
BasicStatus.desc: increases by one when you overheat, does nothing

ManaMax.name: Mana Max
ManaMax.desc: Base limit of 3. When reaching the limit, spend the required <c=status>KNOWLEDGE</c> to gain 1 <c=status>POWERDRIVE</c> and 1 <c=status>LESSON</c>. Excess <c=status>KNOWLEDGE</c> is not lost.

CrystalSpell.name: Crystal Spell
CrystalSpell.desc: X = <c=status>max shard</c>, Lose all <c=status>shard</c>. for each ({{amount_color}}{{ amount }}</c>), attack for X (<c=attack>{{ damage }}</c>) dmg.

BundledCrystals.name: Bundled Crystals
BundledCrystals.desc: Put 3 <c=card>Crystal Shard</c>s in your draw pile

SpellDrawTest.name: Spell Draw Test
SpellDrawTest.desc: draw a card from the spellbook to your hand

DrawFireSpell.name: Draw Fire Spell

DrawAcidSpell.name: Draw Acid Spell

CrystalPouch.desc: Every <c=keyword>10th</c> time you play a <c=card>Crystal Shard</c>, gain 1 <c=status>MAX SHARD</c>.
